title: Walk In Closets, Air Conditioning, Laundry Facilities
map_address: 23645 Meadowridge Dr. near Meadow Ridge Drive
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO CANYON RIDGE', 'We’ll say it – our Santa Clarita location is just fantastic.', 'You’ll appreciate that fact from the moment you find a large one- or two-bedroom floor plan to your liking at Canyon Ridge Apartment Homes.', 'Our local hillsides create a sense of sanctuary from the metropolitan scene, while State Route 14 and Interstate 5 are nearby to ensure a streamlined start to your weekday commute.', 'Valencia retail and dining are just north of the community, as is College of the Canyons, with Six Flags Magic Mountain only a short drive further.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 59', 'OR Text', '59', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Walk', 'In Closets', '- Carpet', '- Window Covering', '- Air Conditioning', '- Vaulted Ceiling', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Cable or Satellite', '- Dishwasher', '- Spacious One- and Two- Bedroom Apartments', '- Patio/Balcony', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Oversized Pool/Spa', '- Laundry Facilities', '- Covered Parking', '- Tennis Court', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Pet Deposit Min/Max: $500 - $1000', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy: Two animals or fewer allowed per apartment.', 'All animals must be six months or older.', 'In addition, a written and signed consent form, veterinarian statement, additional security deposit and registration may be required prior to moving your pet into the community.', 'Animals that assist persons with disabilities are not subject to certain provisions of the pet policy.', 'Please see a leasing associate for details.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Pet', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5x', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Canyon Ridge', '23645 Meadowridge Dr., Santa Clarita, CA, 91321', 'Greystar California, Inc., Broker License #01525765', 'DMCA Agent: <URL>', 'pGY0srxF3Q']
